lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I can. I understand that even without a job (hopefully not for long) I have it so good here. I am so comfortable. Everything is so easy. I grew up in Malawi and then in Zambia. There is absolutely no way to compare life in the US to life there. I give because it is just something I have to do. I owe it to those amazing people who helped raise me and helped me learn to be the person I am.
lender.occupational_info: I study the earth - rocks, mountains, earthquakes, volcanoes, streams, lakes, fossilized bones of older living creatures, and much more. The earth is very big, and I study what it is made of, what makes it change, and how we can live on it and make use of it.

lender.name: Elsa
lender.loan_because: I believe if we all do own share in helping each other, the world will become a better place to live in,
lender.occupational_info: I work in the implementation/reenginering of software systems, which allows me to travell a lott and be in contact with different people,

lender.name: Lilian
lender.loan_because: I started my own business in 2007. And I think everybody should have that possibility.

lender.name: Faren
lender.loan_because: I believe in people's ability to empower themselves.

lender.name: Jeffry
lender.loan_because: I càn!
lender.occupational_info: Long days, hard work, but really enjoyable :-)

lender.name: DrJ
lender.loan_because: I need to remind myself that even thoug I have little in comparison to many americans I still have much compared to others in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large bakery which supplies bread, pies and pastires to markets for resale.

lender.name: Elaina and Mair
lender.loan_because: mum and dad are teaching us to share and we like to make other children smile.

lender.name: Blaine
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can all help make a difference when we come together for a common cause.

lender.name: Gregg
lender.occupational_info: I'm a marketing professional for a large software company

lender.name: ged
lender.loan_because: Having travelled all over the world I've seen terrible poverty and I want to do my bit to help those less fortunate than me and especially those who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Peter Aalen
lender.loan_because: Looks like a brilliant way to help create sustainable growth in the poorer parts of the world..
lender.occupational_info: I study social economies at the university in Oslo and work at youth club in the "poorer" eastern part of Oslo..

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have a concern for people and I love to see other work hard and thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest Dairy Cooperative in the United States

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my family many times over... there is no reason I cannot forward those blessings on to someone else in need!

lender.name: Keegan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make even small dreams come true.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: a loan was made available when I needed it and I would like to pass forward the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the planning of conferences and special events at an Ivy League college.

lender.name: Grandma Lougheed
lender.loan_because: I am interested in supporting people who have the ambition and ingenuity to earn their own living. As a seamstress working with a farming family for many years, I am interested in helping others who could use a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: Grandma is 95 years old and has been a seamstress for many, many years. She is a Canadian great, great grandmother who has lived in rural Bruce and Grey Counties, raised a family that has grown to a total of over 100 children, grandchildren, great grandchildren and great, great grandchildren.

lender.name: Jaff
lender.loan_because: The way to live in the world we wish to inhabit - is to create it through our thoughts and deeds.
lender.occupational_info: An attempt to communicate through Art.

lender.name: rusmeeha
lender.loan_because: Betterment is not a zero sum game. We all can live better.

lender.name: albert
lender.loan_because:
I believe I should give to people who have less, because that is what my Lord and Savior Jesus Christ instructs me to do.
1 Corinthians 4:7
lender.occupational_info: retail

lender.name: Daniel & Jen
lender.loan_because: We love providing people a chance to succeed in their own business and lives

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I admire people who just get on with it - and if I can help support someone do that, great!
lender.occupational_info: Maps on computers

lender.name: Ann
lender.occupation: Recycler and President of Heart2Heart USA
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Recycling is taking one thing - usually something that is considered garbage, like old cardboard boxes - and making it into something else. The company I work for moves a lot of materials away from the waste stream to be recycled.

lender.name: Ex-Pat Canadian Family
lender.loan_because: Tikun Olam - Completing the work of creation by fixing the problems facing humanity and making the world a better place

lender.name: Paul and Fran
lender.loan_because: We couldn't say it better than this: "....peace is inextricably linked to poverty. Poverty is a threat to peace. . . . If I could make so many people so happy with such a tiny amount of money, why shouldn’t I do more of it?" --Muhammad Yunus, 2006 Nobel Peace Prize Winner for his pioneering program of giving microcredit loans to the poor.
lender.occupational_info: 58 loans in 51 countries: Afghanistan, Armenia (2), Azerbaijan, Benin, Bolivia, Burundi, Cambodia (2), Chile, Congo, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Georgia, Ghana, Honduras, Indonesia, Iraq, Israel, Jordan, Kenya, Kyrgyzstan, Lebanon, Liberia, Mali, Mexico, Mongolia, Mozambique, Nepal, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Pakistan, Palestine, Paraguay, Peru (4), Philippines, Rwanda, Samoa, Senegal, Sierra Leone, South Sudan, Sudan, Tajikistan, Tanzania, Togo (2), Uganda, Ukraine, Viet Nam, Zimbabwe

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: Pursuing a master's degree

lender.name: Carol
lender.occupational_info: farm sister

lender.name: Women
lender.occupation: We work for a non-governmental organization
lender.occupational_info: We help survivors of violence, families in crisis, adults re-entering the workforce or learning to read, and the children of our community.

lender.name: nikki
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to enjoy a wonderful life like mine.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I look cute .

lender.name: Le Petit Prince
lender.occupational_info: Software

lender.name: Jesper
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping the local population to start their own business, is far more effective than traditional aid, since this damages the local market of many comodities
lender.occupational_info: Marketing, advertising, CRM, developing creditcard solutions and market analysis

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I think we should all be allowed to provide for our families
lender.occupational_info: I am a student retraining myself for a better future.

lender.name: Gato
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish, feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, feed him for a lifetime. I love that I can show my children that you really CAN change the world. We view this site as a family and read the stories. It's a great program.

lender.name: Q8shoter
lender.loan_because: fun
lender.occupational_info: Daily Pictures From Kuwait Every Thing Every Where

lender.name: The Burr Family
lender.loan_because: This loan is a christmas present to our parents Jim and Marion Burr
lender.occupational_info: They have dedicated their lives to helping others !

lender.name: MacVicar Family
lender.loan_because: we've made it a great family project allowing us to be involved together in assisting others.
lender.occupational_info: Grandmother, 2 Globetrotting Journalists, Homemaker, Financial Advisor, Students, living in Toronto Canada and London UK

lender.name: Shushawna
lender.occupation: fulltime student/trying to start a business

lender.name: Michelle and Thatcher
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed. Kiva allows me to help people around the world and create a domino effect of good fortune. Each time a loan is repaid the funds then go to another person and they are essentially given a chance because someone else has succeeded before them.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I can loan my lunch money to feed a less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the severely mentally and physically challanged.

lender.name: Saul Ewing Marketing
lender.loan_because: It's one way -- a good way -- to help people realize their dreams.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is a fair way for people everywhere to get and use funds. Knowing that they are going to pay us back leads to efficiency and accountability small business, which is important to any nonprofit investor. I enjoy knowing that my small loans are having impact across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a nonprofit by asking for corporate donations and writing grants.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: At the Deerfield Community School (NH) a group of 7th & 8th graders called S.P.L.A.T. had a fundraiser to raise money for KIVA. We raised over $100 and the students decided to loan the money to someone who supported a large family.
lender.occupational_info: I am one of two school counselors at a small rurual school for students in kindergarten through 8th grade.

lender.name: TK_
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Assoc Prof of University

lender.name: Matt and Laura
lender.loan_because:
We believe that neither the country nor the family you happen to be born into should dictate what opportunities you will have in your life to succeed.
“To whom much is given, much is expected.”
“The world was not given to you by your parents; it was loaned to you by your children.”
“It’s not about our people, it’s not about their people. It’s about people.”
lender.occupational_info:
We try to live "other-focused" lives, as we already have been blessed with more than we could have ever imagined. We hope to be able to help others receive the same blessings we have been fortunate enough to receive.
In a world with so many resources and so much to offer, it is unacceptable to us that those who can help do not. For us, we simply must give and make whatever small differences we can in the world. If we all do just a little, we can do immense and miraculous things.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded"
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a doctor.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's not a lot of money, and it will do far more good for someone in the developing world than in my bank balance - it would normally just get spent at the pub.
lender.occupational_info: I am a science teacher, specialising in Biology

lender.name: IHHP.com
lender.loan_because: We believe in making a difference in people's lives and helping to eliminate poverty one loan at a time.
lender.occupational_info: IHHP is a research and learning organization that uses Emotional Intelligence (EI) to leverage performance and leadership by creating lasting behavior change.

lender.name: Gilbert
lender.occupation: President - Retirement Services at The Bryn Mawr T

lender.name: Pamela
lender.occupational_info: I am a staff nurse in a Boston hospital. I provide direct care to patients who have undergone surgery.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: we can be the molecular shift that changes our world for the better.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: It's easy to forget how blessed my family and I am - it's important to help others. I pray that if I'm ever in need, there will be others to help. God put us all on this earth to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I am an unemployed art teacher looking for a job teaching in an intermediate or middle school in Keller, TX.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is in a third world country to get ahead in life. Kiva gives me the opportunity to give someone a starting chance.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: Who would not lend, if you had the resources?
lender.occupational_info: Fun, satisfying, interesting.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I emphasize the positive to journalists and staff at several large hospitals in Canada.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because:
Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege. ~JOHN D. ROCKEFELLER JR.
It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it. ~ALBERT EINSTEIN
lender.occupational_info: From Hawaii. Went to college in Boulder and now I live in San Francisco.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a way to connect with the wider community and help raise living standards. I am inspired by these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I create advertising, write publications, and help my employer reach new clients.

lender.name: Christ through me
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I draw buildings on a computer.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: its important to pay it forward...what goes around comes around. its a pleasure
lender.occupational_info: mother of 3, struggling everyday to keep it together, like all single women out there

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: The price of a bottle of good wine gone without can change someone's life abroad. I'm not saying go without; simply buy cheaper wine and loan the difference!
lender.occupational_info: I research and write the history of people's houses; who lived there, who built it, who designed it, and what they all did for a living.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have never been hungry for long. This is a small way to thank GOD.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: microfinancing empowers people to become active members in a community and it helps to bring entire regions out of poverty and into a sustainable future.
lender.occupational_info: I attend the University of Denver majoring in International Studies and Ecology.

lender.name: OBSI Staff Donation
lender.occupational_info: Independent and impartial dispute resolution service for customers of Canada's banking and investment industries.

lender.name: Madison
lender.loan_because: I believe in development, and development requires empowerment. Kiva offers this to people worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of the world first and foremost, but I am also a Graduate student at American University studying International Development focusing on how social entrepreneurship contributes to economic development.

lender.name: Gus
lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I educate people about different issues affecting their lives, and then help them to organize so that they are able to communicate effectively to the powers that be, and if the powers that be hear what they are saying then hopefully change will follow.

lender.name: Julie
lender.whereabouts: north vancouver, British Columbia, Canad British Columbia

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: Recently visisted Tanzania, was enchanted with the beautiful country, wonderful people and wanted to help in some way.

lender.name: Matador
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to better support themselves and their family

lender.name: everett
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I understand the importance of self-sufficiency. It not only empowers the individual, but the community.
lender.occupational_info: I write historical fiction. Visit my website for more information. I also own a real estate appraisal firm that values real estate for loans and other purposes.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work on figuring out how cancer works so that someday we'll have better ways of treating and preventing it.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: Women with skills, education, and a business change the world for the better for all.My kids have been exchange students to Panama,Chile, Sweden & Spain, and myself to Turkey so these are home too and I want to support the women of these countries.
lender.occupational_info: Raise and educate my kids, take care of patients, and raise Arabian horses.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: Kiva reminds me that the little I have to give can make a significant difference.
lender.occupational_info: I study the law.

lender.name: Lauri & Wonder
lender.loan_because: Despite many struggles, I am fortunate that my life is less difficult than most of my fellow world citizens. I lend because I hope others will be able to fund their security and their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I taught art and philosophy to high school students for 30 years, and then had to retire because of a physical disability. I now have an art studio in my home where I create oil paintings for show and sale.

lender.name: Taina
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to 3rd and 4th graders who think I'm a rock star. Seriously. They asked.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Can the world be made a better place one person at a time? Let's find out...
lender.occupational_info: I managed, and was part owner, of a company that specialized in distribution, engineering and assembly of automation systems used by semiconductor equipment manufacturers. Now, I'm retired, playing music and riding motorcycles.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.occupational_info: We develop solar farms for electricity production.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I feel like I am making a difference in peoples lives and helping them be successful in supporting their families.

lender.name: Carolyne
lender.loan_because: This is the best way for a small amount of money to make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: Community organizing.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Day-to-day I do what I can to minimize my ecological footprint and, by example, encourage others to take steps to improve theirs.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I think this type of small lending is wonderful. Plus, the option to give a gift certificate presents a great opportunity to spread the joy of giving and get others excited about microlending. It's so empowering to see that you can make a real difference in the life of another person. Plus, you're not just making a donation - you're helping someone to make a viable living.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Assistant Director of International Operations for a nonprofit that organizes service programs around the world. I work with organizations and individuals in various communities to arrange the program logistics in order to get volunteers to communities where they serve with local people on local projects. The picture is of me with some students at a summer language camp in Poland.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want to see all people be given a chance to be live their lives. They should be empowered by their hard work and be able to support their loved ones.

lender.name: Axel
lender.occupation: Policy advisor at French environment ministry
lender.loan_because: we should all do the most good for the most people.
lender.occupational_info: I study the flapping flight of pterodactyls - you know 'flying dinosaurs'.

lender.name: Leah
lender.occupation: Work with horses; breeding farm and rescues

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I help women in Guatemala and Mexico start their businesses.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying journalism.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's time to share some of the blessings that God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a secretary.

lender.name: Cheri
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone happy and successful.

lender.name: alan
lender.occupational_info: i own a number of whole sale and retail butcher shops.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it believe it is crucial to our lives to help our fellow man. If I can help someone in any way, I feel better about my life!
lender.occupational_info: I sell fresh Produce to food stores, we purchase these goods from California, Florida, Mexico, Spain and other growing areas.

lender.name: Dave & Anna
lender.loan_because: We believe the overall Kiva scheme is extremely useful to those who need a little help to get a start to improve their situation in life.
lender.occupational_info: Anna is a retired teacher and homemaker and Dave a salesman and we have a larger family of children and grandchildren who seem to be the focus of most of our attention.

lender.name: Dan and Andrea
lender.loan_because: folks just need a little help to make their dreams come true, and I can definitely provide a little help.

lender.name: ANJU
lender.loan_because: It will make a differene in someone's life !

lender.name: Star
lender.loan_because:
I believe that everyone has the desire to be self-sufficient and to provide a comfortable life for their family. Sadly, often, that desire is just a dream.
Although I find that most people are willing to work hard; they are not often provided the means to make that desire and dream a reality.
I have always had people reach their hands out to me to help me make my dreams and desires real, so to be able to help make the dream of another a reality is a true blessing in my life.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a lawyer who for 6 years worked as a public prosecutor, in New York specializing in violent crimes. I enjoyed protecting the rights of victims and their families and also making sure that justice was done fairly for those accused of a crime.
In 1992, I changed careers and began using my legal training as a television broadcaster. Over the last 15 years, I have been a commentator, journalist, and an interviewer. For the last 10 years, I have been a talk show host on a national level...and right now I host my own talk show on "TRU TV" (formerly Court TV) called the "Star Jones Show."
The purpose of our show is to tell the stories of people who often have no voice in the areas of law, justice, entertainment and current events.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: we all need some help now and then

lender.name: Neda
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Le Brayon
lender.loan_because: I loan on Kiva.org because I want to make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software developer. I do French and English freelance translation as well. I work from home.

lender.name: Halvard
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: everyone in every way can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I arrange business to business trade shows

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: i am fortunate enough to be able to do so.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I help because I can and it makes me feel good. Be the change you want to see in the world.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: my wife is khmer and i know how great the need is for small loans in cambodia. so please help!!!
lender.occupational_info: legal work

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: it actually works

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to build better lives for themselves and their families and to promote goodwill in the world community. We're all in this together!

lender.name: Paul D
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make a difference; even as an artist with a very limited income. Many of us are only a paycheck away from needing a loan such as this. I feel that if I make a difference in someone else's life by giving them a chance, that my own life can only prosper in a multitude of ways!
lender.occupational_info: I am a visual artist (sculpture and painting) and educator based in Seattle, WA.

lender.name: Sarabou
lender.loan_because: I want to give to the world what I get from the world. There are so many wonderful people who just need a little bit of help to fly. Many people have helped me over the years. I'm just starting to give back now.
lender.occupational_info:
I dream up large-scale events and write plays for children.
Most importantly, I'm a mom to three beautiful, funny little kids.

lender.name: Beth & J.R.
lender.loan_because: every person deserves the opportunity to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are a father and daughter lending team. Dad enjoys investing in worthwhile causes, and Beth works for a non-profit striving to make people change the way they think about the world.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping women and families around the world. I belong to Soroptimist, an international organization of business and professional women. We help women and families at home and throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I worked with programs which helped children through difficult times.

lender.name: wendell
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business people who need the assistance.
lender.occupational_info: We package and distribute food products to retail and institutional customers.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: The history, purpose, mission,vision, and goals of Kiva impressed me greatly. I believe it is a good way to truly help people who are trying to improve their lives and the situation in their country.
lender.occupational_info: I am a life coach. I help people set and achieve their business and personal goals by attacking, one by one, the obstacles that stand in their way.

lender.name: Harald
lender.loan_because: It is not a lot of money, but it can help a lot!

lender.name: Kent
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: CALEY
lender.loan_because: The world gets better and every one keeps their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I design work spaces to be comfortable, safe and efficient.

lender.name: Joakim
lender.loan_because: I can and should
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Manager in a hotel

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help distill the collective ideas and needs of groups into tangible, beautiful, lasting solutions.

lender.name: francisco
lender.loan_because: as a family we believe in giving back.

lender.name: Nicola Ardigo
lender.occupation: a citizen, a thinker, a human being
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of solidarity and that peace love and good are stronger than the evil.
lender.occupational_info: I think the world is always in need of people doing the right thing.

lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: It's my small way of "paying it forward" and helping someone.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: A little can make a big difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I started my business in 2003 and my success has been in large part due to the generosity of others through coaching, interest and other selfless acts. In a sense, this is my way of paying forward the kindness I have received from so many people that has been so critical to the growth of my own business.
lender.occupational_info: I own a software development and consulting firm. We specialize in Human Resource software; software that tracks address, salary and benefit enrollment for large companies around the world.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My generous daughter gave me a KIVA gift certificate as a Holiday present. I have, in turn, given the same wonderful gift to others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students with disabilities vocational skills.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe you get what you give
lender.occupational_info: I buy houses, fix them up and resell them for a small profit. I also invest in small businesses in my community.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's a satisfying thing to do...and I've got more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect natural areas across Southern Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupation: Retired public relations mgr & chemical engineer
lender.loan_because: I wish to support the efforts of women everywhere to improve their families' standard of living.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I believe that people want to be self-sufficient. The loans help people move toward that goal.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have my own business for many years, and would like to help someone else do the same.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I can help make someone's quality of life just a little bit better! Me considero una persona muy afortunada y ahora que tengo los medios para ayudar a otros, por que no?
lender.occupational_info: Spanish Prof. Soy profesora, especializandome en literatura del siglo XVII.

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: I love helping.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: interesting

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I can share my good fortune with others...my small contribution can combine with others to create a real difference in someone else s life!

lender.name: Thamar en Timo
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough we can do so!
lender.occupational_info: Timo is a logistics manager and Thamar is a lawyer

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It is fun having that little bit of involvement in helping those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Chris Baggott
lender.loan_because:
I understand entrepreneurship and what it can do to raise the living standard not only for the business person but the entire community.
I also understand the handicap of limited opportunity and want to do whatever i can to give people a chance to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a person who starts businesses. Currently I'm on my third. Mostly I'm proud that I've created nearly 500 jobs and at least 20 former employees I know of have gone on to start their own businesses.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: It only makes sense.

lender.name: MUSA Mad Mike
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to be able to help and having an entrepreneur spirit I like to see others succeed on their own as well. Life is full of risks, but if you never take them you never really live. Good luck to everyone!

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: I have overcome many hardships in my life and know the importance of a helping hand and the difference it can make to someone's life. I have had someone reach out that hand to me in the past and I worked hard and made us both proud. I would like the opportunity now to pay it forward.

lender.name: barbara
lender.loan_because: to share the wealth

lender.name: Charlie and Gretchen
lender.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do. Besides, who can pass up an opportunity to help someone in need?

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to make life better for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I operate the controls of the locomotive (train) to move freight from all over the world to different destinations within the United States

lender.name: Daris,Azra&Almir
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: this was a Christmas gift for my parents.
lender.occupational_info: I help a group of family doctors develop new health promotion programs and then evaluate them to determine which programs work and why so we can help our patients become healthier.

lender.name: Marci and Ian
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of helping others to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: We own a software company that automates expert knowledge. We are working on a Virtual Doctor to allow people with minimal training deliver health care in the developing world.

lender.name: Nazia
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: It helps me know that I am contributing to a larger family of the world and the Creator, thru the work of Kiva. My prayers for encouragement reach out to each one.
lender.occupational_info: I was a school teacher, writer. Believor in the Kingdom of God, His love and mercy.

lender.name: The Goughs
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to see how lives can be changed.
lender.occupational_info: Matt is a minister in a Presbyterian Church & Christine is currently home with the kids, but a teacher by trade.

lender.name: Ainsley
lender.loan_because: it's my own form of entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses in conflict zones to help them access new opportunity to create jobs and build a better tomorrow.

lender.name: Don and Janice
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people get the start they need to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We tried to teach our children to love to continue to learn new and exciting things. Learning is a never ending process.

lender.name: Vinodh
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that I can decide where exactly my money goes to. I like helping 'the little (wo)man' directly instead of donating to an organization without knowing what they'll do with the money.
lender.occupational_info: I am a researcher/team leader at the national Dutch Statistics Office, a government-funded, non-profit organization.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate, though I am undeserving. I believe that microfinancing provides hope for those who would otherwise have little. And now, through Kiva, being a part of the process is possible for the "little people." I want to take advantage of this opportunity to give others the chance to better their lives and communities.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: My daughter Amy made this loan on my behave for a Christmas present.
lender.occupational_info: I run a family run lumber company that buys untreated lumber. We kiln dry it and resell it to be used as hardwood flooring, furniture, and manufacturing.

lender.name: Afi
lender.loan_because: I believe in hard work and helping people, and I would want someone to do the same for me.

lender.name: Dave & Beth
lender.loan_because: We received a loan to start a business which made it much easier. This opportunity should be available to all entrepreneurs and Kiva makes it possible.
lender.occupational_info: We produce syrup by tapping white birch trees in much the same way as one would tap maple trees. We tap the trees, collect the sap and boil it to condense sugar in the sap. Eventually it becomes sweet syrup to be used in baking and cooking or dripped on ice cream.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the cornerstone of creating self reliant, confident and independent people. People have been generous to me and now I'm in a position to be generous with others.
lender.occupational_info: Retail Operations Services and Planning. Build and support retail strategy for multi unit operations.

lender.name: Ann-Marie
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is our responsibility to help others in need. One small gesture can make a difference one person at a time.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I would like to help others realize their dreams.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe we all should give back and help each other.
lender.occupational_info: Retired animal lover.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: We have so much to be thankful for, including the opportunity to make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist, a painter and sculptor

lender.name: Pasha
lender.loan_because: "What does the L-RD require of you? Act Justly, Love Mercy, Walk Humbly with your G-D" Micah 6:8
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use their Mac computers with confidence.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work on websites, publishing content and managing technology projects. I am also a volunteer editor for Kiva.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I've been a poor, homeless, single mom and only with education and help from many people am I able to be secure with a roof over my head, enough to eat, and to keep my family healthy. I can't change the world, but I can try to change my little corner of it.
lender.occupational_info: I help healthy people stay healthy and I help sick people take as good care of their health as possible. I do this by giving them them information and tools to let them make informed healthcare decisions.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: To make a long term difference in world poverty there must be a sustainable free market that provides self sufficiency and self esteem: " give a man a fish, feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime"
lender.occupational_info: I sale building materials

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with others around the world.

lender.name: Ashleigh
lender.occupation: President of a small staffing company

lender.name: Barnett
lender.loan_because: Sometimes a little help may go far, if everyone do their part.
lender.occupational_info: Electronic Engineer Federal Aviation Administration

lender.name: Andres
lender.loan_because: I can and I understand.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: former attorney/actuary- now stay at home mom
